about_the_game:
Welcome to Bot Hunt! a charming 2D top-down multiplayer shooter that combines the thrill of hide-and-seek with intense shooting action, all wrapped up in nostalgic pixel art graphics. Dive into a world where strategy, stealth, and sharpshooting collide, offering a unique multiplayer experience that will keep you coming back for more.

  • Pixel-Perfect Combat: Engage in fast-paced shooting action with a top-down view, rendered in beautifully crafted pixel art. Each map, character, and weapon is a pixelated masterpiece, bringing a classic arcade feel to modern multiplayer gaming.

  • Prophunt With a Twist: Experience the beloved game mode prophunt like never before. In Bot Hunt, not only do you hide or seek - you fight. Transform into inconspicuous objects to evade detection or sniff out your opponents and engage in explosive combat.

  • Multiplayer Mayhem: Jump into online battles with friends or players from around the globe. Whether teaming up to hunt down hidden enemies or facing off in thrilling shootouts, Bot Hunt delivers endless multiplayer excitement.

  • Proximity Chat: Communication is key to victory. Bot Hunt's proximity chat feature adds an immersive layer to the game, allowing you to strategize with teammates or taunt your enemies as you sneak past them disguised as a harmless object.

  • Diverse Arsenal: Arm yourself with a wide range of pixelated weaponry. From rapid-fire blasters to strategic explosives, choose your tools wisely to outsmart and outshoot your adversaries.

  • Ever-Evolving Maps: Explore a variety of dynamic environments, each with its own challenges and secrets. Maps are designed not just for hide-and-seek, but for strategic combat, offering endless opportunities for clever plays and heart-stopping ambushes.
